else

} else {
	let mk=cache.getFromMemory(url+'2')||0;
	cache.putMemory(url+'2',mk+1);
	let tmh = new Date().getHours();
	if (/content_news\/all|animation_list\/all|fc_search\/all/.test(url)) {mk>3&&cache.delete(url);}
	else if (mk>1||tmh>1&&tmh<4) {
		cache.deleteMemory(url+'2');
		cache.delete(url);}
}
webr = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(webr);
webr.select('.posts>.post')

    "User-Agent": java.getWebViewUA(),
    "Origin": Get('url'),
    "Referer": Get('url'),
    "Cookie": cache.get(Get('url') + 'ck') || ''
}

JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

<js>
url = source.getVariable()
if (url==""){java.toast("\nå¯é€šè¿‡ç™»å½•æˆ–è®¾ç½®æºå˜é‡è·å–æœç´¢åœ°å€")}
resultList=[]
webSrc=java.ajax(url)
d = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(webSrc)
title=d.select("title").text()
java.log(d)
explore=[]
d.select(`a[href~=sort|list|rank|tag|shuku|fenlei|Soft|allvisit|paihang|quanben|gudian|lishi|dushi|wangyou|kehuan|yanqing|wuxia|xuanhuan|chuanyue|zhentan|kongbu|top|category|mulu]:not(a:matches(\\d+|ä¸‹ä¸€é¡µ|ç™»å½•|æ³¨å†Œ|More\+))`).forEach(a=>{
	url=String(a.attr("href")).replace(/1(\.html)?(\/)?$/,`{{page}}$1$2`)
	if(!explore.find(e=>e.url==url)){
		explore.push({title:a.text(),url:url})
		}
	})

charset=webSrc.match(/charset="?([^"]+)"/)?String(webSrc.match(/charset="?([^"]+)"/)[1]).toUpperCase():""
//charset = d.select("meta[charset]").attr("charset").toUpperCase()
forms = d.select("form")
forms.forEach(form => {
	   java.log(form)
    let action = form.attr("action")
    let method = form.attr("method").toUpperCase()
    formInner = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(form.html())
    let names = formInner.select("[name]")
    let body = []
    let searchUrl = []
    let options = {}
    names.forEach(n => {
        let name = n.attr("name")
        let value = n.attr("value") == "" ? `${/(search)?key/i.test(name) ? "{{key}}" : ""}` : n.attr("value")
        if (names.length == 1 || /(è¾“å…¥|å¯æœ)/.test(value)||name.match(/^(q|wd)$/)||/(search)?key(word)?/i.test(name)) {
            value = "{{key}}"
        }
        if (value == "" && n.select("option").length > 0) {
            value = n.select("option")[0].attr("value")
        }
        body.push(`${name}=${value}`)
    })
    body = body.join("&")
    java.log(body)
    if (method == "GET"||method=="") {
        searchUrl.push(`${action}?${body}`)
    } else if (method == "POST") {
        searchUrl.push(action)
        options.body = body
        options.method = method
    }
    if (!/UTF-?8/.test(charset) && charset != "") {
        options.charset = charset
    }
    if (Object.keys(options).length) {
        searchUrl.push(JSON.stringify(options, null, "  "))
    }
    result = searchUrl.join(",")
    resultList.push({"index":String(source.getVariable()).replace(/,.*/,"")+"\næœç´¢åœ°å€"+resultList.length,"url":result,title:title,explore:JSON.stringify(explore)})
    java.log(result)
})
//java.log(JSON.stringify(resultList))
if (resultList.length==0){
	resultList.push({"index":String(source.getVariable()).replace(/,.*/,"")+"\næœªæ‰¾åˆ°æœç´¢åœ°å€","url":"",title:title,explore:JSON.stringify(explore)})
	if(/webview/i.test(source.getVariable())){java.toast("æœªæ‰¾åˆ°æœç´¢åœ°å€")}else if(source.getVariable()!=""){java.toast("\nè¯·å°è¯•åˆ‡æ¢ä¸ºwebviewè·å–æˆ–åˆ‡æ¢UA")}}
result=JSON.stringify(resultList)
</js>

} else {
    var list = JSON.parse(result).items;

    }
}

injectJs: if(location.href.indexOf('https://passport.csdn.net/signwap')!=-1 || location.href.indexOf('https://passport.gitcode.net/cross')!=-1){localStorage.removeItem('isLogin')};function getCookie(name){var cookies = document.cookie.split(';');for (var i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {var cookie = cookies[i].trim();if (cookie.indexOf(name + '=') === 0) {return cookie.substring(name.length + 1);}} return null;}if(getCookie('UserName') && localStorage.getItem('isLogin')!=1){localStorage.setItem('isLogin',1);location.href=`https://blog.csdn.net/${getCookie('UserName')}`};setTimeout(()=>{ if(getCookie('UserName')){if(document.querySelector('.logout')){var para = document.createElement('a');para.setAttribute('href','https://passport.csdn.net/account/logout');para.setAttribute('class','openApp');para.innerHTML='é€€å‡º';document.querySelector('.openApp').parentNode.replaceChild(para,document.querySelector('.openApp'));}else{var para = document.createElement('a');para.setAttribute('href',`https://blog.csdn.net/${getCookie('UserName')}`);para.setAttribute('class','openApp');para.innerHTML='ä¸ªäººä¸­å¿ƒ';document.querySelector('.openApp').parentNode.replaceChild(para,document.querySelector('.openApp'));}}else{ document.querySelector('.openApp').parentNode.removeChild(document.querySelector('.openApp'));} },300);setTimeout(()=>{document.querySelector('.m_toolbar_left_app_btn').parentNode.removeChild(document.querySelector('.m_toolbar_left_app_btn'));},300);
style: .openApp,.m_toolbar_left_app_btn{display:none !important;}
